0: There was a separate shower in the room as well
we had dinner and breakfast in our room
but of course they ended up including it
Upon returning to our room after our evening out rooms were not turn down like they have been in the past
But I kind of held the Ritz to be over the top when it came to staying at a hotel
My only complaint is that it was a little dark drab in the hallways and common areas
I reported this problem at check out and the young man at the front desk casually said he will make a note of it without a hint of real apology

To continue in a picky theme I am a little disappointed to find that a hotel chain built on the best in quality and service for it is brand stocks bathroom toiletries which do not match their brand ethos on the glitzy trashy outside packaging or the cheap and cheerful inside content
If you want to have a relaxing and very comfortable stay away from home
1: It was a fabulous three nights with great amenities and superb service
Wonderful customer service just like a Ritz should be
Service is impeccable as always and we especially love the lobby bar
Delicious food great service and fun lobby scene
They also have free bikes great for a fun ride to a restaurant
We loved the location in St Louis and the bar area was very festive and fun at night
Also the hotel is super nice and smells like vanilla all of the time
What a great vibe this city and this hotel has
Clean rooms a fabulous conference room but especially notable for the great staff
